column4: server has 3 NICs, 2 connected to vlan 1, and 1 connected to vlan 2, #1 10.1.32.203 #2 10.1.33.201 #3 10.1.32.201. Running tcpdump on each interface shows a ping test to #1 received request, but replys coming on #2 interface
